presentationTable.name: Simple Calculations
presentationTable.description: This folder contains simple calculations where each metric is defined as a division of two base facts. Eg:- Unit Price, Avg Order Size and so on

presentationColumns.name: 17  Net Costs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.17  Net Costs

presentationColumns.name: 20  Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.20  Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Unit Price is computed as Revenue divided by Billed Quantity

presentationColumns.name: 22  Discount Rate
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.22  Discount Rate

presentationColumns.name: 23  Avg # of Orders by Customer
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.23  Avg # of Orders by Customer
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
# of Orders by Customer is computed as Number of Distinct Orders divided by Number of Distinct Customers in the fact table.

presentationColumns.name: 24  Avg # of Orders by Sales Rep

localization.localizationKey: 24  Avg # of Orders by Sales Rep

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.24  Avg # of Orders by Sales Rep
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
# of Orders by Employee is computed as Number of Distinct Orders divided by Number of Distinct Employees in the fact table.

presentationColumns.name: 25  Avg Order Size
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.25  Avg Order Size
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Average Order Size is computed as Revenue divided by Number of Distinct Orders in the fact table.

presentationColumns.name: 29  Collect to Bill Ratio
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F6 Logical Calculations Examples.29  Collect to Bill Ratio
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Collect to Bill Ratio is computed as Paid Amount divided by Revenue.
